title: Textile, 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on natural white linen. Formal symmetrical, yellow leafy strapwork supports floral swap in red, blue and green, strands of pearls and central floral group in red and blue with white bird. Pattern repeats side to side, in half drop repeat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-82.
